CatDescriptText: Cutline for related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 10, 1961, pg. A32, reads: "Little League Pirates - With Manager James Newton standing in background, these are the 8-to-12 age group Pirates, of the Uptown Community Little League.  Front row, from left: H. Hardy, G. Troupe, A. Piper, E. Jamison, H. Littlejohn, E. Gibson.  Second row: D. Allan, P. Petite, H. Arnold, L. Tarplay, C. Battle, W. Chapman and R. Lee."
TitMainTitle: Pirates Little League baseball team, front row from left: H. Hardy, G. Troupe, A. Piper, E. Jamison, H. Littlejohn, E. Gibson; second row: D. Allan, P. Petite, H. Arnold, L. Tarplay, C. Battle, W. Chapman, R. Lee, and manager James Newton, on Kennard Field
